extendedInfo.description: Drive through amazing tracks and destroy as many vehicle as you can in each thrilling and entertaining level. Enjoy the mayhem, and collect all three stars from each level and gain coins to enhance your monster vehicle even more!Three themes, with different monster cars! First theme has the fun Monster Beetle, the second theme has the more traditional Monster Truck, and the third theme introduces a Monster Sportscar, with extra power! Start the engine now!

reviews.title: Like it? .....yeah i do
reviews.comment: Fun game, but i would like to see more options for tilt control. It makes me have to sit up to play it and i don\'t like to do that; because I\'m super lazy.
reviews.author: alex garrity

reviews.title: Nice fun game
reviews.comment: A lot like hill climb racing, yet unique in its own ways. Pretty fun time passing game, far to rare to find anymore. I just wonder why its so important to keep people from playing games.
reviews.author: William Landreth

reviews.title: Not that bad
reviews.comment: I like the game but having to spend coins to buy the next level isn\'t cool...its hard to get through this game by managing both upgrades and.stages
reviews.author: Osmund Elliott

reviews.title: Fun  but buggy.
reviews.comment: This game has more bugs than any other one ive ever played. It force closes a lot and doesn\'t keep track of your progress very well. It is fun though. Easy but fun. Fix all the bugs and its 5stars.
reviews.author: Dan Fisher

reviews.title: Forcecloses!
reviews.comment: Does not allow me to even hit \"Play\". It force closes ALL the time. I uninstalled and reinstalled...same issue. RazrMaxx Verizon.
reviews.author: Shadiest Vue

reviews.title: Great for toddler
reviews.comment: My toddler loves this game. He\'s 3, and all about monster trucks. The game has easy controls for him. However, the game will no longer open on my Motorola Atrix. Tried reinstalling and it still won\'t open. Please fix!
reviews.author: Jessica Taylor

reviews.title: F
reviews.comment: Fun game but it keeps force closing definitely uninstalling
reviews.author: Reggie Wilson

reviews.title: Good time waster
reviews.comment: May have a couple of glitches but overall is quite good.
reviews.author: Jack Silver

reviews.title: H
reviews.comment: I like this game and my son loves this game BUT mosttimes at different times it shutsdown no  warning and returns to home screen
reviews.author: Jen Willcox

reviews.title: Good... not great
reviews.comment: Its good game... great for passing time... my gripe is the achievements and how much it \"costs\" to advance to next car... after updating the vehicle  and making it pretty far I can\'t start off at that point the next time I play...
reviews.author: paul alexander

reviews.title: Awesome game but
reviews.comment: Awesome but I got frustrated by flipping over so easy
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Car phod di
reviews.comment: Jaise hi ye game install kia.. vaise hi mere padosion ki car tutne lagi.. mere dost ko chashma lag gya. Ab vo chashme k bina sab kuch dekh pata. Aur vo padhne me bhi acha ho gya h. Aur bhot bekar marks se paas hota hai. Class k sabhi failure usse jalte hai. Kyunki usne sabhi failures ko peeche chod dia hai.. ab is game ki vajah se bhot mehengai ho gyi hai.. ab din me 24 ki jagah 25 ghante hote hai.. ab ye sab to mazak tha. Sach batau to ye game nhi hai. Bas dimaag kharab krne ki machine hai
reviews.author: Siddharth Batra

reviews.title: Awsome game
reviews.comment: This game is awsome who ever dosen\'t like it is a pease of sh*t
reviews.author: Brandon Redmond

reviews.title: Cool ap
reviews.comment: Sweet game just a lil uncontrollable
reviews.author: Chris Head

reviews.title: Controls Poorly
reviews.comment: The game is fun, but the touch controls are awful! Is there an alternative control scheme?
reviews.author: Jonathan Catiller

reviews.comment: This game is very addictive fun to play to pass the time
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun but annoying
reviews.comment: The game is really fun but level 17 is super annoying otherwise the game is really fun
reviews.author: Ally Maccall

reviews.title: Monster truck havoc
reviews.comment: When i try to play my screen just locks this game is fucked up
reviews.author: Matthew Davis

reviews.title: great game!
reviews.comment: my grandson is a monster truck fanatic loves this game.
reviews.author: Christopher Gilbert

reviews.title: I love it
reviews.comment: I love it great graphics level 19 is hard for me :D
reviews.author: George Short
